code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import shareReducer from'./share';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import{sessionReducer}from'./sessionReducer';import userReducer from'./user';import uiReducer from'./ui';var rootReducer=combineReducers({share:shareReducer,session:sessionReducer,user:userReducer,ui:uiReducer});var enhancer;if(process.env.NODE_ENV==="production"){enhancer=applyMiddleware(thunk);}else{var logger=require("redux-logger").default;var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;enhancer=composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk,logger));}var configureStore=function configureStore(preloadedState){return createStore(rootReducer,preloadedState,enhancer);};export default configureStore;
